item.comments: 28 to get luck fairy in the credits
1=unsealed 2=wedjet 3=left after wedjet 4 blah blah doesn't really matter
unlike other guardians, no 1 state for ankh, just skips to 2

item.comment: fairy points work and healing fairy in credits

item.comments: 1=once 2=twice also sets 39d and 420 but this is the one which controls hard mode enemy spawns

item.comment: 1 = unlocked, 2 = solved, 3 = seen (not effective until then, sun-flooded is set on the same frame)

item.comments: bits 0-2=three collapsing floors in the room above nuckelavee
1=mural dais 2=small mural in place 3=use pochette key 4=killed palenque
1=counting down, 2=fatal in the twins race rooms; interestingly this isn't cleared if you exit abnormally
1=??? 2=fall on the platform hard enough to activate it
1=I remember when this was a block puzzle floor 2=dragon
1 You'd think this has multiple stages, but no, that's all temporary flags
1=xelpud 2=left room after collecting 3=reported in and got the la-mulana talisman
1 applies to both spots you can see him
1=on sale 2=talked to him or bought it
bits = open chests you walked by, 0x1f = complete (0x10 for completion I think since there are just 4?)
1=dais 2=barriergone (there is no 3 for solving, that's the ladder)

bit 0=right bottom wall, bit 1 = right middle wall, bit 2=right top wall, bit3=top wall (left dais), bit 4=top dais, bit 5=last breakable wall, bit 6 = bottom left dais (bottom wall), bit 7 = bottom dais (teleporter wall)
1=hit block 2=cut off tip, 3=cut off tip but softlocked because hatch closed
1, this is the dais in the room above anubis
1,2=break 3=dais uh 4 triggered when I went back to illusion

item.comment: 0 when even number of tiamat's children killed, 1 when odd
1=spawned 2=asked queen 3=animation reached critical point then back to 2 when you climb up, weird
definitely set when you buy it but goes 2 then 1, I don't even

item.comments: 5 unreadable ancient la-mulanese tablets read = mail 37

item.comment: Number of Tiamat's children you've murdered, you monster
1=entered tiamat's room after killing all her children 2=tiamat killed

item.comments: this is when you get the score boost to 50, also probably the steam achievement

item.comment: 1=available 2=acquired then back to 0 on dismiss, 3 after panelque

1=hear about dracuets from mulbruk 2=dracuets in mouth 3=night 4=xelpud 5=fairy 6=upside down door 7=talked to dracuets inside door 8=talked to dracuets in gate of time 9=talked to dracuets in tower of the goddess
1=infinity symbol you use the key of eternity on appears

item.comments: fairy queen in the credits checks for any of 0/1/2 for the whip
